name: Oath of peak: Open world
description:
【Five Classes to choose from】

There are five powerful classes with mighty unique talents - Alkaid, Megrez, Dubhe, Phecd and Alioth. Alkaid, a reliable teammate who can charges and takes damages; Dubhe, like a lightning with high mobility and high attack speed. Let’s pick the class that suits you best and customize your very own appearance!

【Tame and breed the Beasts】

Almost every beasts in this fantasy world can be sealed. After sealing the beasts, you can train it get stronger then fight with you! Among them, the ancient beasts from far east such as Kirin, Zhulong, Baize, Qiongqi and other mysterious beasts in "The Classic of Mountains and Seas" are also used for reference. You can even mate and breed your beasts!

【Create deep connections with friends】

Multiple romantic relationship simulator and you always need a buddy during a great adventure. Sworn friends? True love? It’s totally possible to find your destined ones in this game! Take their hands and head on the journey together!

【Fight for your team and head to the peak】

We provides a wealth of multi-player and single-player instance to explore. Gather your trustworthy teammates to have thrilling fights against your hostile guild or to challenge formidable monsters together. Form an invincible team and conquer the land! Fight with them for honor and glory!

【Dive in the mysterious oriental world】

Welcome to the oriental fantasy world! Whether it is the main storyline, the scenes on the map, or the monsters that can be sealed, oriental elements can be found everywhere here.

Now is the time! Let‘s head to the peak! Find our communities in:
